fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Drain Punch**: Play a Health Steal! (8) on your target, heal an extra HP if this ability is on the last use. (2 uses)
- **Close combat**: Play an Upgraded Attack! (1) on your target, you will lose 1 HP,  2 if this ability is on the last use. (2 uses)
- **Spore**: Put a target to sleep, roleblocking and blackmailing them. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Poison Heal**: Poison effects, Poison! (6) and Intoxicate?! (52) will instead heal you for the damage dealt/attack tier.
